fields.title: Frontend Developer
fields.description:
Build beautiful, performant user interfaces using React and Next.js for our clients.

  • Modern JS frameworks
  • Animation & microinteractions

fields.title: UI/UX Designer
fields.description:
Create engaging digital experiences and work with both Figma and dev teams for pixel-perfect handoff.

  • User research
  • Wireframes & prototypes

fields.title: Backend Developer
fields.description:
Develop APIs and microservices with Django and FastAPI, powering scalable products.

  • Database design
  • REST/GraphQL

fields.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
fields.description:
Plan, execute, and measure results of digital campaigns across channels for our clients.

  • PPC, SEO, SMM
  • Content strategy

fields.title: Account Manager
fields.description:
Act as the main point of contact for key clients, ensuring their satisfaction and growth.

  • Client presentations
  • Upselling services
fields.requirements:
• 3+ years in account management
  • Great interpersonal skills

fields.title: Content Writer
fields.description:
Write compelling blog posts, web copy, and campaign content for a range of brands.

  • SEO-optimized writing
  • Content calendars

fields.title: SEO Strategist
fields.description:
Analyze, plan, and implement SEO strategies to drive traffic and conversions for clients.

  • Technical audits
  • Backlink building

fields.title: Project Manager
fields.description:
Lead cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and on budget.

  • Agile/Scrum
  • Client communication
fields.requirements:
• Certified Scrum Master a plus
  • Experience with digital products

fields.title: Graphic Designer
fields.description:
Create digital assets for web, social, and advertising campaigns.

  • Photoshop/Illustrator
  • Brand guidelines
fields.requirements:
• Portfolio of design work
  • Experience with motion graphics is a bonus

fields.title: Sales Executive
fields.description:
Generate new business and help Maindo grow through strategic outreach.

  • Lead generation
  • Client pitches

fields.title: Junior QA Tester
fields.description:
Ensure quality releases by writing test plans and reporting bugs to dev teams.

  • Manual and automated testing
  • Bug tracking
fields.requirements:
• Basic coding skills a plus
  • Attention to detail

fields.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
fields.description:
Automate deployment and infrastructure for our cloud-native applications.

  • CI/CD
  • AWS or GCP experience
fields.requirements:
• 2+ years in DevOps role
  • IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible)

fields.title: Social Media Manager
fields.description:
Grow and engage audiences for top brands on social platforms.

  • Campaign strategy
  • Analytics & reporting
fields.requirements:
• Track record managing brand socials
  • Canva/Adobe Suite experience

fields.title: Product Owner
fields.description:
Shape and prioritize product features for internal tools and client solutions.

  • Stakeholder management
  • Agile processes

fields.title: Mobile App Developer
fields.description:
Develop innovative cross-platform mobile apps using React Native or Flutter.

  • UI/UX for mobile
  • App Store/Play Store deployment

fields.title: Finance Administrator
fields.description:
Manage invoicing, budgets, and contracts for a fast-paced digital agency.

  • Bookkeeping
  • Quickbooks/Xero
fields.requirements:
• Finance degree or 2+ years relevant experience
  • Attention to accuracy

fields.title: Client Success Manager
fields.description:
Ensure clients are getting value from our products and services, and help retain/grow accounts.

  • Onboarding & support
  • Upsell opportunities

fields.title: Copywriter (Portuguese/English)
fields.description:
Craft high-impact content in both English and Portuguese for web and campaigns.

  • Bilingual writing
  • Brand tone/voice
fields.requirements:
• Fluency in PT and EN
  • Relevant writing samples

fields.title: HR & Talent Acquisition Lead
fields.description:
Find and hire world-class digital talent for our fast-growing team.

  • Recruitment strategy
  • Culture champion

fields.title: Junior Support Analyst
fields.description:
Assist clients and staff with support tickets, training, and troubleshooting.

  • Helpdesk systems
  • Process documentation
